name: Kaido
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may discard one card from your hand: if this character was played this turn, place up to 1 of your opponent's 7 cost or lower characters in the trash. Then, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

effect.text: You may discard one card from your hand: if this character was played this turn, place up to 1 of your opponent's 7 cost or lower characters in the trash. Then, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.
